name: Glitch Simulator 2018
description:
You are living in a simulation, and the simulation is glitching. Explore the virtual world, find glitches, fight zombies and break through the illusion. Glitch Simulator 2018 is a game about glitches, discover amazing bugs and share them with your friends. Bugs, bugs are everywhere...

Features:
  • Teabag zombies
  • Practice bunny hopping
  • Walk around aimlessly
  • Discover bugs & glitches
  • Choose from 4 weapons
  • Assassins will try to murder you
  • Zombies will try to eat your brains
